availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles Green Wallace (Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, attorney. Ohio native. Son of Robert Wallace and Jane Wallace. Attorney in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, p. 164B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, District 1, p. 307.
Find A Grave, "Charles G. Wallace (August 20, 1832-November 29, 1893)," Memorial #66259713, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66259713 (accessed May 7, 2019).
U.S., Presbyterian Church Records, 1701-1970, Presbyterian Historical Society, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, Session Register 1841-1868, VAULT BX9211 .K41011 F52 v.1 (accessed via ancestry.com), p. 78.
